sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Coal Tar Sealant Disclosure Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Coal Tar Sealant Disclosure Act.

sections.heading: Coal tar sealant disclosure; public schools.
sections.text: Coal tar sealant disclosure; public schools.

sections.heading: Coal tar sealant disclosure; State property.
sections.text: Coal tar sealant disclosure; State property.

sections.heading: Exemptions. Nothing in this Act applies to a construction project or sale in which coal tar-based sealant or high polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbon sealant product is used for roofing application
sections.text: Exemptions. Nothing in this Act applies to a construction project or sale in which coal tar-based sealant or high polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbon sealant product is used for roofing application.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect January 1, 2023.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect January 1, 2023.
